title: HOUR 1 - Lakers, Cowboys, Bears
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Lakers, Cowboys, Bears
description:
More bad news for the Dallas Cowboys

The Lakers getting Patrick Beverly is a good move, it also says how they feel about Russell Westbrook

The Chicago Bears might be looking at a bad season

 

Guest: Kevin Clark
